Lyric:
[by:李维特特特]
[00:20.28]Everytime I close my eyes
[00:23.26]그날이 생각날 때면
[00:28.24]Everytime I close my eyes
[00:31.28]다시 또 설레이곤 해
[00:35.27]언제나 내 맘속에
[00:39.24]그 날의 그 순간들은
[00:43.26]여전히 내 맘속에 고스란히 기억될
[00:48.00]The best scene of my life
[00:50.93]more than anything
[00:52.22]The day before last christmas
[00:55.43]and gently flowing melodies
[00:59.87]In the soft light of candles
[01:03.33]Is where I sang my song for you
[01:07.18]And in your eyes
[01:09.36]In your face
[01:11.36]In the way you hold my hand
[01:15.66]The memories of you
[01:18.23]with me I'll never forget
[01:22.30]Everytime I close my eyes
[01:33.41]밤새 고민하고 썼던
[01:37.84]그 편지를 읽어가며
[01:41.34]너무나 떨렸던 그 순간들까지도
[01:47.35]언제나 내 맘 속에
[01:51.32]그 날의 그 순간들은
[01:55.35]여전히 내 맘 속에
[01:57.35]고스란히 기억될
[02:00.12]The best scene of my life
[02:03.10]more than anything
[02:04.40]The day before last christmas
[02:07.32]and gently flowing melodies
[02:11.95]In the soft light of candles
[02:15.43]Is where I sang my song for you
[02:19.19]And in your eyes
[02:21.48]In your face
[02:23.45]In the way you hold my hand
[02:27.82]The memories of you
[02:30.29]with me I'll never forget
[02:34.43]Everytime I close my eyes
[02:52.31]The day before last christmas
[02:55.36]and gently flowing melodies
[02:59.98]In the soft light of candles
[03:03.38]Is where I sang my song for you
[03:07.25]And in your eyes
[03:09.44]In your face
[03:11.59]In the way you hold my hand
[03:15.73]The memories of you
[03:18.28]with me I'll never forget
[03:22.40]Everytime I close my eyes
